cast.overview: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents.
cast.title: The Virgin Suicides

details.biography: Phoenix is a French indie rock band from Versailles, formed in 1995. Their line-up, which has remained unchanged since their formation, comprises Thomas Mars (lead vocals), Deck d'Arcy (bass, keyboards, backing vocals), Christian Mazzalai (guitar, backing vocals) and Laurent Brancowitz (guitar, keyboards, backing vocals). Thomas Hedlund has been the band's session and live drummer since 2005.
details.name: Thomas Mars
